description: Verify the caching-fix skill correctly parses scoring output, prioritizes, fixes, and re-scores.

tests.name: Accept Scoring Input
tests.prompt: Run caching-fix with the scorecard as input
tests.setup: Provide a caching-scoring scorecard with 5 issues across Cache-Control Headers, Static/Dynamic, Request Dedup.
expectations: Run caching-fix with the scorecard as input
Verify skill parses all 5 issues with correct severity and category
Verify skill identifies the weighted score and grade
tests.pass_criteria: All issues extracted. No issue lost or duplicated.

tests.name: Fix in Severity Order
tests.prompt: Run caching-fix and observe fix application order
tests.setup: Scorecard contains CRITICAL (authenticated data cached publicly), HIGH (no revalidation after mutations), MEDIUM (no cache() dedup).
tests.pass_criteria: Public cache leak fixed first (CRITICAL), then revalidation (HIGH, 15% weight), then cache() dedup (MEDIUM). No MEDIUM fix applied before all HIGH items resolved.

tests.name: Fix References Correct Pattern
tests.prompt: Run caching-fix and check which reference file the skill loads
expectations: Check which reference file the skill loads
tests.pass_criteria: Skill loads `references/fix-patterns/headers-revalidation.md` and applies the "NO_CACHE_HEADERS" pattern. Fix adds `Cache-Control: private, no-store` to authenticated API responses.

tests.name: Verification Step Confirms Fix
tests.prompt: Run caching-fix to apply the Static Page Conversion fix and verify build output
tests.setup: Apply the "Static Page Conversion" fix from `static-dynamic-isr.md`.
expectations: Run caching-fix to apply the fix
Check that skill verifies: `pnpm build` output shows correct static/dynamic classification
tests.pass_criteria: Skill checks build output for static indicator on the converted page. Reports verification result before moving to next fix.

tests.name: Re-Score Shows Improvement
tests.prompt: Run caching-fix through full cycle and compare before/after scores
tests.setup: Initial score 55/100 (grade C). Apply fixes for 1 CRITICAL + 3 HIGH issues.
tests.pass_criteria: Re-score produces a higher weighted score. Each fixed category shows improvement. Final grade is at least B. Report uses `assets/templates/fix-report.md.template` format.
